org.forgerock.openidm.http

Interface SecurityConfigurator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JettySecurityConfigurator

    public interface SecurityConfigurator
    Interface to configure security

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Let the security configurator apply its configuration
      void deactivate(org.osgi.service.http.HttpService httpService, org.osgi.service.http.HttpContext httpContext, org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext context)
